data.title: The Netherlands to decriminalize insulting heads of state
IS executes 250 women for refusing sexual jihad: report
Russian engineers have used dogs and robots to successfully clear the ancient Syrian city of Palmyra of nearly 3000 explosive devices left behind by Islamic State.
Referendum on abolishing monarchy must be held when Queen dies, republicans demand
Islamic face veil to be banned in Latvia despite being worn by just three women in entire country
Super rich who hide money in tax havens to be unmasked
Edward Snowden to sue Norway in a bid to secure free passage in Norway without being extradited to the US. He wants to come to Norway to accept a freedom of speech award.

David Cameron will not be investigated over off-shore trust and tax affairs by parliamentary watchdog
Olympic bike lane collapses in Rio; at least 2 die
Jamaica Foreign Minister tells UN that scheduling cannabis as a dangerous drug with no medical use is outdated & out of touch & that the UN to needs to get its act together on weed
Private US firms are opposing India's space program from launching US satellites into space.
UK secret police is indiscriminately spying on millions of innocent people. New docs revealed by court order show staggering surveillance by MI5, MI6, GCHQ.

Pakistan Islamists step up call for Asia Bibi's execution: Bibi, a Catholic mother of five, was convicted of blasphemy and sentenced to death after being accused of insulting the Prophet Muhammad by a group of Muslim women who were angry Bibi drank from the same water container as them.

The UK Jewish community was “in shock” this week after the UK National Union of Students applauded arguments why NOT to commemorate Holocaust Memorial Day and voted a woman who rails against “Zionist-led media” to be its next president
